budget_title: Global Air-Traffic Management modifications on a Quick Reaction Capability Medium Altitude
explanation: Funds will be used for the procurement and installation of Mission Essential Package and Global Air-Traffic Management modifications on a Quick Reaction Capability Medium Altitude Reconnaissance and Surveillance System (MARSS) aircraft in order to be able to deploy the platform and | help execute the MARSS SIGINT and FMV mission as directed under the SECDEF's Global Force
